page.title: 13TOURISM AROUND GRAFTON
page.content: We get a lot of tourists in Temple Grafton as we are near Stratford. We have 60km of paths and 6 nature trails.We also have 4 caravan parks one of which is permanent.Caravan rallies are also held here.Welford has two public houses, 'The Bell' and the 'Four Alls'. Boating is also popular on the river at Welford. Tourists visit Stratford to see Shakespeare's Birthplace, staying at a Bed and Breakfast establishment or Hotel.They could also go to the Theatre. In Grafton itself there are very few recreational facilities.There is a restaurant called 'The Stables' where they do Bed and Breakfast and a public house, 'The Blue Boar'.
